gist.headline: Fresh paint in the garden
gist.blurb: A new creative tool has bloomed! Immage Generator is now listed in our community showcase for all your pixel-pushing needs.
gist.summary: Added Immage Generator, a web-based AI image creation tool, to the Creative apps collection.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access this new image generation interface directly from the community apps list.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee as an artist. Since this is an image generator app, the visual metaphor is creation and art. Polly wearing a beret represents the 'Creative' category.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny painter's beret, standing next to an easel with a glowing canvas. A chunky pixel robot nearby holds a palette. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
